article: stock prices closed higher for the third consecutive day in tokyo friday as the afternoon news report that the struggling long-term credit bank of japan -lrb- ltcb -rrb- would merge with sumitomo trust and banking co. revitalized the market at the last minute of the day 's session .
abstract: tokyo share prices continue rising on bank merger news
candidates: bank of japan to merge with sumitomo trust and banking co. news of merger revitalized the market at the last minute of the day 's session.
